meta.title: Emelly Beatriz | Frontend Developer - Project Portfolio
meta.description: Portfolio of Emelly Beatriz, a frontend developer passionate about technology and design. Explore my projects in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python and see how I transform ideas into functional and aesthetic digital solutions.
meta.keywords: Frontend Developer, Portfolio, Emelly Beatriz, Web Developer, Projects, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, UI/UX
meta.ogDescription: Explore the projects of Emelly Beatriz, a frontend developer who creates creative and functional digital solutions.

home.intro1: Passionate about creating intuitive and visually impactful digital experiences, always looking to collaborate on innovative projects. ✨

project0.title: History of the Android Mascot
project0.description: A project that explores the history of the Android mascot, developed with HTML and CSS. This project presents a visual narrative about the evolution of the iconic mascot of the Android operating system.

project1.title: Modern Cordel
project1.description: A Modern Cordel project developed with HTML and CSS, presenting a contemporary approach to traditional cordel literature.

project2.title: Calculator
project2.description: A simple calculator developed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, allowing users to perform basic mathematical operations intuitively and quickly.

project3.title: Solar System
project3.description: An interactive Solar System project developed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This project allows users to explore the planets of our solar system in a visual and educational way, providing an engaging and informative experience.

project4.title: To-Do List
project4.description: A To-Do List application developed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It allows users to add and remove tasks, providing a simple and effective way to manage their daily activities.

project5.title: BMI Calculator
project5.description: A simple and functional BMI (Body Mass Index) calculator developed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This tool allows users to enter their weight and height to calculate their BMI, providing a quick and easy assessment of their body condition.

project6.title: Netflix Replica
project6.description: A high-fidelity model of the Netflix interface, developed with only HTML and CSS. This project focuses on visually reproducing the platform's layout and design, providing a visual experience similar to the original, without interactive functionalities.

project7.title: Stopwatch
project7.description: A simple stopwatch developed with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, allowing users to start, pause, and reset the time.

project8.title: CPF Validator
project8.description: A simple tool built with pure JavaScript to validate CPF numbers based on the official algorithm.

project9.title: Rock, Paper, Scissors Game
project9.description: An interactive Rock, Paper, Scissors game developed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript where users can play against the computer, testing their skills and luck.

project10.alt: Dashboard for salary analysis in the data area
project10.title: Salary Analysis Dashboard for the Data Field
project10.description: An interactive dashboard built with Python and Streamlit to explore and analyze salary data in the Data Science field, based on data collected in recent years.

project11.title: Professional Portfolio
project11.description: Portfolio page developed to showcase my career and projects. Created with pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it includes light/dark mode and responsive design for a pleasant experience.

project12.title: Java Bank
project12.description: Java banking system for managing accounts, portfolios, and investments. Allows you to create accounts, make transfers, invest, check balances, and view transaction history. Focused on OOP best practices, exception handling, and modular architecture.

project13.alt: Nikel Project - Personal Finance Web Application
project13.title: Nikel
project13.description: Nikel is a personal finance web application designed to help users organize their finances effortlessly. It allows users to track their income and expenses, view their current balance, and manage transactions in a simple and intuitive interface.

project14.alt: Interactive roadmap for developers and IT professionals
project14.title: Path4developers
project14.description: An interactive and intelligent roadmap that guides IT professionals in their learning journey, combining progress tracking, data persistence, and the power of AI Gemini for explanations and personalized project suggestions. Have complete control over your study plan, customizing each step of your path.

div3.title: Professional Journey
div3.intro: This is a timeline highlighting my most recent and important experiences. For a complete overview of my career,
div3.cvLink: click here to view my resume

item1.title: Freelance Projects - Frontend
item1.desc: Frontend developer skilled in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, dedicated to crafting dynamic and responsive interfaces. I prioritize clean code and user-centered design principles to create intuitive and inclusive digital experiences, while also exploring backend integrations.

item2.title: University Ambassador
item2.desc: Representative for DIO to promote innovation and connect the platform to the academic community, developing leadership and technical skills through projects and events.

skills.title: Skills
skills.noSkills: No skills found for this category.

footer.aboutText: Made it to the end? Awesome! If my work has sparked your interest, let's not stop here. Connect with me to create something amazing together.
